sysevent_email_template.message:
BEGIN:VCALENDAR PRODID:-//Service-now.com//Outlook 11.0 MIMEDIR//EN VERSION:2.0 METHOD:REQUEST BEGIN:VTIMEZONE TZID:Eastern Standard Time BEGIN:STANDARD DTSTART:16011104T020000 RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;BYDAY=1SU;BYMONTH=11 TZOFFSETFROM:-0400 TZOFFSETTO:-0500 END:STANDARD BEGIN:DAYLIGHT DTSTART:16010311T020000 RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;BYDAY=2SU;BYMONTH=3 TZOFFSETFROM:-0500 TZOFFSETTO:-0400 END:DAYLIGHT END:VTIMEZONE BEGIN:VEVENT ATTENDEE;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT;RSVP=TRUE:MAILTO:${to} ORGANIZER:mailto:aegislimited@service-now.com DTSTART:${dt_start} DTEND:${dt_end} LOCATION:${location} TRANSP:OPAQUE SEQUENCE:0 UID:${sys_id} DTSTAMP:${dtstamp} DESCRIPTION:Description - ${description} SUMMARY:${title} PRIORITY:5 X-ALT-DESC;FMTTYPE=text/html:\n\n\n\n\nAEGIS\n\n\n\n\n

${description}

\n\n

\n\n\n X-MICROSOFT-CDO-BUSYSTATUS:OOF X-MICROSOFT-CDO-ALLDAYEVENT:TRUE X-MICROSOFT-CDO-IMPORTANCE:1 X-MS-OLK-AUTOSTARTCHECK:FALSE CLASS:PUBLIC END:VCALENDAR
sysevent_email_template.name: reservely.calendar.integration
sysevent_email_template.subject: SPECIAL CASE TEMPLATE -- Push changes into an outlook calendar
